verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Who am I that You are mindful of me
That You hear me when I call
Is it true that You are thinking of me
How You love me it's amazing...

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I am a friend of God (3x)
He calls me friend

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
God Almighty
Lord of Glory
You have called me friend
